Package edu.baylor.flarn.services

Class ProblemService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.baylor.flarn.services.ProblemService
  • @Service
public class ProblemService
extends java.lang.Object
    Problem service includes CRUD operations for Problem model. However, it don't allow any delete operation. Instead it archives the problem. It excludes the archived problems whenever list of all problems are queried.
